job description:
Data Scientist

Responsibilities: This role requires the individual to define business challenges, design analysis to address these challenges, execute the analysis, read the results of the analysis and present findings to managers. The successful candidate will be able to:
  • Understand the source, content and definition of data residing in database tables and various data structures
  • Identify trends in the information
  • Analyze the impact of specific product / service offerings
  • Write programs for data extraction and cleansing 
  • Extract data using SQL
  • Organize and analyze data using Excel, Python or R
  • Perform analysis using statistical methods
  • Recommend and design on-going reporting as necessary
  • Work closely with technical and non-technical employees to design and deliver strategic analysis
 Technical Requirements:
  • 2+ years prior business experience programming using Open Source technologies such as R and Python.
  • Ability to write SQL (Data Manipulation Language)
  • Experience using Perl a plus
  • Understanding of Oracle and Microsoft SQL Server databases a plus
  • Experience with data warehouses, Oracle Data Miner or similar BI tools a plus
  • Experience creating and/or interpreting predictive models a plus
  • Experience using Big Data Technologies (Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Flume, or Pig) a plus
 Other Requirements:
  • 2 years of work experience in a related industry
  • Excellent, self motivated work ethic
  • High energy with a passion for analyzing complex data sets
  • Strong problem-solving skills
  • Ability to effectively relay technical and analytical information to the business
  • Desire to work for a growing company in a fast-paced, customer-centric environment
 Education:
  • BS in Computer Science, Statistics, Economics or Mathematics
  • Masters degree a plus
